channel.title: Comentarios en: El examen sorpresa y la retroinducción.

item.title: Por: Anónimo
item.dc:creator: Anónimo
item.description: The peculiarities of retroinduction are manifested in its manner to mislead anyone of us. We can face any paradoxes on the way to understanding it.
item.content:encoded: The peculiarities of retroinduction are manifested in its manner to mislead anyone of us. We can face any paradoxes on the way to understanding it.
